Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer® K2 EDTA Blood Collection Tubes
Specimen Container(s): BD Vacutainer® K2 EDTA Blood Collection Tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer K2 EDTA Blood Collection Tubes used for venous blood collection and HbA1c testing
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for trained healthcare professionals to collect, contain, preserve, and transport human venous blood specimens for in vitro diagnostic testing, including Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) testing
